bookInfos.title: $('#content > table > tr:nth-child(1) > td > table > tr:nth-child(1) > td > table > tr > td:nth-child(1) > span').text().trim()
bookInfos.author: $('#content > table > tr:nth-child(1) > td > table > tr:nth-child(2) > td:nth-child(2)').text().trim()
bookInfos.classes: $('#content > table > tr:nth-child(1) > td > table > tr:nth-child(2) > td:nth-child(1)').text()
bookInfos.isend: $('#content > table > tr:nth-child(1) > td > table > tr:nth-child(3) > td:nth-child(2)').text()
bookInfos.cover: $.location($('#content > table > tr:nth-child(5) > td > table > tr > td:nth-child(2) > a:nth-child(1) > img').attr('src'))
bookInfos.brief: $('#content > table > tr:nth-child(5) > td > table > tr > td:nth-child(2)').html()
